pkgmetadata.longdescription: hathorlib=========Hathor Network base library.## ConfigurationTo install dependencies, including optionals, run: poetry install -E client## Running the testsTo run the tests using poetry virtualenv: poetry run make testsIf are managing virtualenvs without poetry, make sure it's activated and run: make tests## Running lintersTo run linters: poetry run make checkOr without poetry venv: make check
